existing_features.title: Remove hardcoded phone number and address from the footer and render the footer “Visit Us” block using `siteContent.contact.address` and `siteContent.contact.phone` so updates automatically propagate to the footer.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the business contact phone number and location information displayed in the app/site

Make the business phone number and location (address) editable from a single source of truth in `frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts`, and ensure the Contact section displays those values from `siteContent.contact`.

projectName: Update business phone number and location everywhere it appears
